pages.text: You may stumble upon a $(l)Vault God Altar$() inside the Vault. Each one of the Vault God's has a different requirement to complete and reveal a $(l)Altar Chest.$() $(br) $(li) Idona asks for mob kills $(li) Tenos asks for exp levels $(li) Wendarr asks for time $(li) Velara asks for health$() $(br2)The requirements are scaled to Vault Level.

When completing an altar, a Vault God Favor might be $(l)gained or lost$(). The chance of gaining a Vault God Favor increases when a Vault God Idol is in the player's offhand: $(li)3% chance with any Idol $(li)6% with a matching Idol $(li)9% with a hallowed matching Idol. $(br2)When a favor is gained, a favor of another Vault God is lost.
